page.title: 16Outlying Areas
page.content:
The Outlying Areas Of Pershore
{Trading Estate
The trading estate is quite big.It has got factories and companies, a few of the firms ;pipe makers,Arctic, poultry packers and car repair shops. There is a supermarket with a car park as well. {HOUSES Most of the buildings are residential houses and bungalows.These are a mixture of detached,semi-detached and terraced,private and council owned.There are also a few farms and factories. {The land use}is mainly crop growing;_fruit,vegetables and cereals.
